titles.title: Accountability in Department of Veterans Affairs Scheduling and Consult Management Act

A bill to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to review the processes and requirements of the Department of Veterans Affairs for scheduling appointments for health care and conducting consultations under the laws administered by the Secretary, and for other purposes.
Accountability in Department of Veterans Affairs Scheduling and Consult Management Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Accountability in Department of Veterans Affairs Scheduling and Consult Management Act
This bill directs the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) to evaluate and monitor its processes of making health care appointments and scheduling at both VA facilities and non-VA facilities.
The Government Accountability Office shall review such VA compliance and data veracity.
